statements: SELECT * FROM QualityControlDashboards;
SELECT dashboard_name, created_by FROM QualityControlDashboards;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlDashboards WHERE created_by = 'Alice';
SELECT dashboard_name, metrics FROM QualityControlDashboards WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT dashboard_id, last_updated FROM QualityControlDashboards ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT dashboard_id, dashboard_name, created_by, creation_date, last_updated, metrics FROM QualityControlDashboards;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlDashboards WHERE created_by = 'John Smith';
SELECT dashboard_name, created_by, creation_date FROM QualityControlDashboards WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(metrics) AS num_metrics FROM QualityControlDashboards;
SELECT dashboard_id, dashboard_name, created_by, LAST(updated) AS last_updated FROM QualityControlDashboards ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM QualityMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM QualityMetrics WHERE metric_value > 50;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM QualityMetrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Dashboards WHERE analyst_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT dashboard_name, visibility FROM Dashboards WHERE visibility = TRUE ORDER BY dashboard_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM QualityMetrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM QualityMetrics WHERE metric_value > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT metric_name FROM QualityMetrics;
SELECT * FROM Dashboards WHERE visibility = TRUE AND analyst_id = 'df64e91c-5b17-41ee-b198-91c5f0d2428d';
SELECT dashboard_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM Dashboards JOIN QualityMetrics ON Dashboards.dashboard_id = QualityMetrics.metric_id;
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name FROM quality_metrics ORDER BY metric_id DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_department FROM analysts WHERE analyst_department = 'Data Science';
SELECT * FROM analysts WHERE analyst_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_description FROM dashboards WHERE dashboard_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY dashboard_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_name ASC;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_department FROM analysts WHERE analyst_department = 'Sales';
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_description FROM dashboards WHERE dashboard_description LIKE '%performance%';
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics qm JOIN analysts a ON qm.metric_id = a.analyst_id;
SELECT DISTINCT analyst_department FROM analysts ORDER BY analyst_department DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysts;
SELECT name, email FROM analysts WHERE analyst_id = 1;
SELECT dashboard_name, created_date FROM dashboards WHERE created_by = 100 ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description FROM metrics WHERE metric_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT dashboard_name, metric_name FROM dashboards INNER JOIN dashboard_metrics ON dashboards.dashboard_id = dashboard_metrics.dashboard_id;
SELECT * FROM analysts WHERE analyst_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM analysts WHERE analyst_id > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT dashboard_id, dashboard_name, created_by FROM dashboards WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01' AND created_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT metrics.metric_name, metrics.metric_description, dashboards.dashboard_name FROM metrics JOIN dashboard_metrics ON metrics.metric_id = dashboard_metrics.metric_id JOIN dashboards ON dashboard_metrics.dashboard_id = dashboards.dashboard_id;

SELECT analysts.name AS analyst_name, metrics.metric_name AS metric_name, dashboards.dashboard_name AS dashboard_name FROM analysts JOIN dashboard_metrics ON analysts.analyst_id = dashboard_metrics.dashboard_id JOIN metrics ON dashboard_metrics.metric_id = metrics.metric_id;
SELECT * FROM QualityMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM QualityMetrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Analysts ORDER BY analyst_role DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_role FROM Analysts WHERE analyst_id = 3;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_description FROM Dashboards WHERE dashboard_name LIKE '%dashboard%';
SELECT * FROM QualityMetrics;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_role FROM Analysts ORDER BY analyst_role DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_description FROM Dashboards WHERE LENGTH(dashboard_description) > 50;

SELECT analyst_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM Analysts JOIN MetricsMapping ON Analysts.analyst_id = MetricsMapping.analyst_id JOIN QualityMetrics ON MetricsMapping.metric_id = QualityMetrics.metric_id WHERE QualityMetrics.metric_value > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT dashboard_name FROM Dashboards JOIN DashboardMetrics ON Dashboards.dashboard_id = DashboardMetrics.dashboard_id WHERE DashboardMetrics.display_order < 5;
